query: exercise tolerance functional capacity amiodarone beta-blockers atrial fibrillation physical activity six minute walk
title: Atrial fibrillation: comorbidities, lifestyle, and patient factors
authors: Eduard Shantsila, Eue-Keun Choi, Deirdre A. Lane, Boyoung Joung, Gregory Y. H. Lip
reference: Shantsila, E., Choi, E.-K., Lane, D. A., Joung, B., & Lip, G. Y. H. (2024). Atrial fibrillation: comorbidities, lifestyle, and patient factors. The Lancet Regional Health - Europe, 37, 100784. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.lanepe.2024.100784
